entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 5:55 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: ENE 58 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
